actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs (Subsequently: Energy and Natural Resources)
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs (Subsequently: Energy and Natural Resources).

official_title: A bill to designate certain lands in San Luis Obispo County, Calif., as the "Santa Lucia Wilderness".

summary.text: Designates as the Santa Lucia Wilderness, specified lands in and adjacent to the Los Padres National Forest, California. Authorizes the Secretaries of Agriculture and Interior to acquire any non-Federal lands within the area designated as wilderness by this Act.

titles.title: A bill to designate certain lands in San Luis Obispo County, Calif., as the "Santa Lucia Wilderness".
